original_text: If you are careful to obey these commands, David's descendants will continue to rule as kings in this city. They will ride on horses and on chariots to come in through the city's gates. Their officers and their people will come with them.
korean_text: 너희가 참으로 이 말을 준행하면 다윗의 왕위에 앉을 왕들과 신하들과 백성이 병거와 말을 타고 이 집 문으로 들어오게 되리라

sentences.original_text: If you are careful to obey these commands
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 이 명령들을 주의 깊게 순종한다면

sentences.original_text: David's descendants will continue to rule as kings
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗의 후손들이 계속해서 왕으로 다스릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to come in through the city's gates
